title: Battlestar Galactica: The Miniseries (1)
overview: Forty years after the end of the Cylon War, the artificially-created Cylons declare war on humanity by attacking and destroying the twelve colonies. The military crumbles after their newly updated ships shut down in the face of a new unknown Cylon weapon. A lone Battlestar, Galactica, due to be decomissioned and converted into a museum, turns out to be the only thing standing between the Cylons and the total destruction of the human race.

title: Battlestar Galactica: The Miniseries (2)
overview: Fleeing from the Cylon tyranny, the last Battlestar, Galactica, leads a rag-tag fugitive fleet, on a lonely quest...a shining planet, known as...Earth.

title: The Story So Far
overview:
Battlestar Galactica: The Story So Far is a special program aired on the Sci Fi Channel that summarizes the first 2 seasons of the Re-imagined Series. The special was intended to attract new viewers and offers no new content for frequent viewers of the series.

Narrated by actress Mary McDonnell (voicing the narration in her character of Laura Roslin), The Story So Far ignored several supporting and significant story arcs and character developments in the interest of the program's limited 43 minute air time.

title: Razor (1)
overview: This episode takes us back to the time when Lee Adama was commanding the Pegasus. We are introduced to Kendra Shaw, acting 2nd in command on the Pegasus.  1 raptor has gone missing and a  rescue mission is launched to recover it. We see Kendra's arrival on the Pegasus just before the first cylon attack and her rise through the ranks in the aftermath of the attack. She had to make tough descisions to ensure the survival of the BSG, following Admiral Cain's lead.

title: Razor (2)
overview: A continuation of Razor, with a focus on Kendra Shaws point of view. The search and rescue mission changes when the crew discovers an old Cylon ship with the first version of the humanoid cylons onboard.  The story is told in flashbacks, taking us back to the days when the Pegasus was flying solo, and even back to the first Cylon war.

title: Revealed
overview: A look back at the first three seasons of the sci-fi space opera, with commentary by executive producers Ronald D. Moore and David Eick.

title: The Phenomenon
overview: Battlestar Galactica: Phenomenon is a celebrity-studded celebration of the show's impact on pop culture. Seth Green, Brad Paisley, Joel McHale, and others, wax poetic about why Battlestar Galactica is one of the best frakkin' shows on television.

title: The Lowdown
overview: Battlestar Galactica: The Lowdown was a special documentary/promotional program that discussed the origins of the Battlestar Galactica Miniseries that aired on the Sci Fi Channel on Novemeber 26, 2003.

title: Catch the Frak Up
overview: A 13 minute narrated video clip giving you a full update of what has happened in Battlestar Galactica up to Season 4 Episode 10.

title: Face of the Enemy (1)
overview: While on his way to get some R&R Gaeta's Raptor makes an unexpected detour.

title: Face of the Enemy (2)
overview: While stranded in the middle of space, Gaeta and the other passengers realize that time and air is limited.

title: Face of the Enemy (3)
overview: Gatea realizes that he knows one of the Eights more than he lets the others believe.

title: Face of the Enemy (4)
overview: After Pilot Eight's death, the passengers begin to suspect foul play.

title: Face of the Enemy (5)
overview: While trying preserve the air supply, Gaeta thinks back to the Eight he knew on New Caprica.

title: Face of the Enemy (6)
overview: Gaeta decides to go with Eight's plan on getting them home.

title: Face of the Enemy (7)
overview: As Hoshi and Racetrack search for the missing Raptor, Gaeta realizes that he might not be as safe as he thought.

title: Face of the Enemy (8)
overview: With almost all the passengers dead, Gaeta realized that sometimes it's hope in others that blinds you.

title: Face of the Enemy (9)
overview: With the help of Eight, Gaeta makes some harsh realizations about himself.

title: Face of the Enemy (10)
overview: With no hope of rescue in sight, Gaeta has to make a final decision about his future.

title: The Top 10 Things You Need To Know
overview: Top Ten Things You Need to Know about Battlestar Galactica to be ready for the final episodes.

title: The Last Frakkin Special
overview: Before the last episode airs, cast and crew talk about the series; its inception, the casting, music, how it developed, the challenges that had to be overcame, the legacy it will leave behind and the memories everyone will leave with.

title: The Plan
overview: The Plan storyline begins before the attack on the 12 colonies and will show events mainly from the perspective of two Cylon agents, Cavil and Anders.

title: The Resistance (1)
overview: Galen Tyrol and Saul Tigh attempt to recruit new soldiers for the resistance against the Cylon occupiers on New Caprica.

title: The Resistance (2)
overview: Tyrol and Jammer are unsuccessful in recruiting Duck into the Resistance. Tigh proposes a controversial hiding place for the weapons cache.

title: The Resistance (3)
overview: Tigh and Tyrol hide the weapons while Duck discusses religion with his wife, Nora.

title: The Resistance (4)
overview: Cally and Nora worship at the temple and talk about Galen and Duck's religious beliefs. The Cylons go on the attack.

title: The Resistance (5)
overview: Duck mourns Nora's death. He asks Tyrol whether the Resistance hid guns at the temple.

title: The Resistance (6)
overview: Tigh and Barolay are pleased that the Cylon crackdown has brought in over 150 new recruits to the Resistance. Jammer is still upset about Nora's death and Duck's grief.

title: The Resistance (7)
overview: Tigh and Tyrol discuss Jammer's detention by the Cylons. Tigh fears that Jammer will give up the Resistance members.

title: The Resistance (8)
overview: Doral offers to "help" Jammer prevent future massacres.

title: The Resistance (9)
overview: Tyrol greets Jammer after he is released from the detention center. Duck returns to his tent to mourn his wife's death.

title: The Resistance (10)
overview: Duck makes a dangerous decision regarding the Cylons. Jammer appears to have made a different decision.

title: Razor Minisode (1): Day 4,571
overview: William "Husker" Adama prepares for his rookie combat mission as a Viper pilot.

title: Razor Minisode (2): The Hangar
overview: A moment in Galactica's hangar rattles young Adama's nerves before his first combat flight.

title: Razor Minisode (3): Operation Raptor Talon
overview: Vipers and Raiders face off in a brutal firefight above a remote world defended by the Cylons.

title: Razor Minisode (4): Free Fall
overview: Losing his Viper is just the start of rookie William Adama's problems today.

title: Razor Minisode (5): The Lab
overview: Downed rookie pilot William Adama discovers a gruesome Cylon secret project.

title: Razor Minisode (6): Survivors
overview: William "Husker" Adama struggles to free human prisoners from the Cylon lab.

title: Razor Minisode (7): Escape
overview: Adama witnesses the rise of a new Cylon threat and gets unexpected news from the Galactica.
